predicate.note: Frames file for 'wire' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 11.5, 22.4, 37.4, Framenet entry Communication means.

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary wired a note of condolences to John's parents.

example.name: specific meaning
example.text: Video Telecom Corp., which markets videoconferencing systems, is working with court reporters [*-2] to wire a nationwide network to allow depositions by live television.

a nationwide network to allow depositions by live television

example.name: arg2 as PRD
example.text: Called Task Broker, the program acts something like an auctioneer among a group of computers wired [*] together.
